articles.author: Jihye Lee, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets slide further in early trading as Wall Street pauses market rally - CNBC
articles.description: Investors in the region also further assessed economic data that has been released this week.
articles.content: Asia-Pacific markets slid as Wall Street saw a pause in its market rally and the broad market index fluctuated near its highest closing levels since August 2022. Investors in the region also further … [+1521 chars]
